data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Hacken at Borås Arena.
In the minute 2, Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
Throw-in Elfsborg.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Boras.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elfsborg's half?
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Boras.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Elfsborg are caught offside.
In the minute 11, Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elfsborg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jesper Karlsson (Elfsborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 16, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Leo Bengtsson (Hacken) has received a yellow card from Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 17, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg's Jesper Karlsson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Free kick Elfsborg.
Sivert Heltne Nilsen (Elfsborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Boras Hacken drive forward through Adam Andersson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 24, Goal! Elfsborg have got their heads in front thanks to a Johan Larsson strike.
That's a fine assist from Simon Olsson.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
In the minute 27, Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Gustav Henriksson (Elfsborg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Hacken at Borås Arena.
In the minute 29, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrik Walemark for Hacken drives towards goal at Borås Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Elfsborg are pushing forward but Rasmus Alm's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, Glenn Nyberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
Elfsborg push forward at Borås Arena and Jesper Karlsson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hacken defence.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 32, Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Elfsborg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 38, Glenn Nyberg signals a Hacken throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Jesper Karlsson is booked for the home team.
Free kick Hacken.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust gets in a shot on goal at Borås Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Hacken.
Joona Toivio (Hacken) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
In the minute 43, In Boras a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Boras to check on Gustav Henriksson, who is grimacing with pain.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 45, Hacken are coming forward and Godswill Ekpolo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Glenn Nyberg awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Boras.
In the minute 46, Glenn Nyberg has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Hacken at Borås Arena.
Free kick Hacken.
The away team replace Gustav Berggren with Alexander Faltsetas.
Christopher McVey is on a sub for Gustav Henriksson for Elfsborg.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Rasmus Lindgren (Hacken) strikes at Borås Arena but his header is cleared.
In the minute 47, Leo Vaisanen (Elfsborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Elfsborg's Johan Larsson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Hacken at Borås Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Rasmus Lindgren gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hacken.
Throw-in Hacken.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Jesper Karlsson for Elfsborg drives towards goal at Borås Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Patrik Walemark of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Hacken pushes forward through Daleho Irandust, whose finish on goal is saved.
Elfsborg push upfield but Glenn Nyberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 58, Elfsborg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 59, Elfsborg drive upfield and Rasmus Alm gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hacken defender.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, Elfsborg drives forward and Johan Larsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 61, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Hacken's area.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
Frederik Holst for Elfsborg has been booked by Glenn Nyberg and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Hacken's Rasmus Lindgren is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Per Frick for Elfsborg has been booked by Glenn Nyberg and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 66, Hacken's Adam Andersson breaks free at Borås Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Elfsborg's Per Frick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hacken defender.
In the minute 70, Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Leo Bengtsson with Ahmed Yasin. This is the second substitution made today by Andreas Alm.
Hacken make their third substitution with Jasse Tuominen replacing Alexander Soderlund.
In the minute 72, Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Borås Arena, Simon Olsson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Adam Andersson of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
In Boras Hacken attack through Patrik Walemark. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, Glenn Nyberg awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken's Jasse Tuominen gets in a shot on goal at Borås Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Samuel Holmen is replacing Simon Olsson for the home team.
Ahmed Yasin (Hacken) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Elfsborg at Borås Arena.
Elfsborg's Rasmus Alm misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Alexander Faltsetas (Hacken) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Adam Andersson (Hacken) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 81, Erik Friberg (Hacken) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Simon Strand is on a sub for Jesper Karlsson for Elfsborg.
The away team replace Patrik Walemark with Viktor Lundberg.
Rasmus Lindgren for Hacken gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Boras.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Free kick Hacken.
In the minute 84, In Boras Hacken drive forward through Jasse Tuominen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Elfsborg.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Hacken throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
Johan Hammar is replacing Godswill Ekpolo for the away team.
In Boras a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Hacken needs to be cautious. Elfsborg have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Elfsborg.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg are pushing forward but Johan Larsson's finish is wide of the goal.
Hacken have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Borås Arena. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! Johan Hammar equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Hacken make their fifth substitution with Oskar Sverrisson replacing Rasmus Lindgren.
